verses.text: Ix lolonnhej winhaj Job:
Swak' in ti' t'a yichanh Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil, aton jun max yal sk'ol sb'oan yaj tas waji, aton tz'ak'an ixtaxel in pensar yuj in yaelal,
yacb'an pitzan into, yacb'an tzato yal wik'an wik' yuj, anhej tas yel ol wala', manh ol wal tas manh yeloc.
Toxon malaj b'ak'uinh ol wala' to yel tas tzeyal t'ayin. Manh ol in chaoch t'a wib'anh to ay in mul.
Ol walnhej to wach' in pensar, manh ol in k'ex tas swala'. Tzin b'eyk'olej wal in b'a to malaj in mul swab'i.
Masanil heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, jaocab' yaelal t'a yib'anh heb', icha yaelal sjawi t'a yib'anh heb' chuk.
多Tasto wal ayoch yipoc sk'ol heb' chuk, ayic tz'ik'jiel sk'inal heb' yuj Dios?
Ayic ayoch heb' t'a syaelal, 多tom ol scha yab' Dios ayic ol tewoc heb' t'ay?
多Tocwal tz'ilchaj stzalajk'olal heb' d'ha Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil tato malaj b'aj syal sb'a heb' t'ay?
Ha ticnaik ol in ch'ox wal sniwan poder Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil t'ayex yet' tas nab'il yuj.
Ha ex tik eyilnacxo juntzanh chi', haxo ticnaik jun, 多tas yuj tzex lolon t'a manh pensaril?
Ha jun yaelal tik syak' Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil spacoc t'a heb' ixtum anima.
Wach'chom tzijtum yuninal heb', palta ol cham heb' t'a owal, ma yuj wejel.
Axo heb' olto kan t'a skal heb', a ilya ol ik'an scham heb'. Axo heb' ix yetb'eyum heb' scani, manh ol ok'laj heb' ix yuj heb'.
Wach'chom a heb' chuk chi' ste molb'ej k'een plata heb' icha lum pokok, wach'chom manh jantacoc spichul heb' ayeq'ui,
axom junok winh winak te wach' spensar ol ak'anoch juntzanh pichul chi', ol yak'an snib'ej winh yet' k'een plata chi'.
Ha spat heb' chuk chi', k'uun, lajan icha juntzanh yet'tal nok' tzocoy, ma icha junok lechpat t'a kal munlajel.
Ha heb' chuk chi' swaycanem heb' yet' sb'eyumal, haxo tz'el swayanh heb' manhxalaj tas t'a heb', mheb'haxo heb'.
Ha xiwelal ol jawok t'a heb' icha ha' eluma', ma icha tz'aj yik'jib'at junok tas yuj ik'nhab' t'ak'walil.
Ha chacxuxum ik' scot t'a stojolal b'aj sjawi k'u, a ol ek' leman spat heb',
ol och xuman t'a heb', ol lajwoquel heb' yuj. Wach'chom olto snib'ej el lemnaj sb'a heb', palta manhxalaj niwank'olal t'a heb'.
Ha jun owal ik' chi' ol k'anh wal, ol xururoc yoch t'a spatic heb'.
